start_command_private:
Hello, I am Markinphant, a Telegram bot that can generate text based on a sample text. You can use me by adding me to a group, I will learn from messages and randomly send a message to the group at a configurable interval.

You can find my source code at https://git.n64.cc/netkas/markinphant
For more information on how to configure me in groups, send /help
start_command_group: Send /start to me privately to learn more about me!
